name: Artificial Intelligence to Genie in a Bottle
description: Changes the term "Artificial Intelligence" or "AI" to "Genie in a Bottle. Because news about AI are written in a way that makes it seem like a higher power. Works also in Finnish. Credit of the idea goes to my friend Lauri. Source at https://github.com/mikkoim/genie

name: Wypl®
description:
Wypl est un assistant de navigation qui permet à l’internaute de protéger sa vie privée quand il navigue sur internet tout en recentrant la pertinence de ses recherches sur ses besoins réels par l’indexation d’un contenu personnalisé.

La solution est téléchargeable gratuitement par internet et s’installe facilement. Grâce à son intelligence embarquée, Wypl permet de minimiser l’utilisation des moteurs de recherche et d’en réguler la consommation. Moteurs qui font transiter par leurs serveurs l’ensemble des
données générées dans le cadre de leur utilisation, exposant les internautes à une utilisation de leurs données personnelles non conscientes et non autorisées d’une part les annonceurs à des frais de référencement exponentiels les plaçant sous une véritable dépendance et domination
économiques d’autre part.

De plus Wypl agira comme un pare-feu en empêchant l’accès aux données personnelles de l’internaute des programmes de tracking collecteurs de données privées.

L’assistance fournie par la Wypl permet à l’internaute d’avoir un contrôle accru sur son utilisation d’internet, tant dans ses recherches que sur la gestion de ses données personnelles.

name: 0T Reverse Image Search
description:
This add-on adds a drop down menu offering reverse image searches when an online image is right clicked.

There are no permission requirements.

Search Engines Available:
Google
Bing
Yandex
TinEye
SauceNao
IQDB

name: 1 2 key for tab switch
description: Switch your Firefox tabs like in old Opera 12 Presto! Easily switch between tabs to the left or right using the ordinary keys 1 and 2.

name: 0wikipedia
description:
Türkiye'de wikipedia.org'a erişim yasaklandığı için insanların çoğu 0wikipedia.org alternatifine yöneliyor. Bu eklenti, Wikipedia linkine tıkladığınızda sizi otomatik olarak 0wikipedia.org adresine yönlendiriyor.

Turkey blocks access to wikipedia.org and many people are using 0wikipedia.org alternative to keep reading wikipedia articles. This extension automatically redirects you to 0wikipedia.org equivalent when you click on a Wikipedia link.

name: 1-Click View Negative Ebay Feedback
description:
Click "1-Click Ebay Feedback" on any Ebay Auction or Ebay User page to view all of the seller's negative and neutral feedback.

ViewAllFeedback collects all of the Ebay feedback in the spot, even beyond 1 year, and displays potential issues. This helps ensure the item you are considering buying comes from a seller who has an acceptable reputation. Avoid problems ahead of time and look for red flags as past negative experiences can also happen to you in the future. Save time and money with 1 click (instead of Ebay's pages which may be 20+ pages long).

Addon uses 3rd party site (www.knowyourfeedback.com) for operation.

Privacy: No user information of your own is collected. Only history on the profile-of-interest is collected (and also this information is not stored for more than 1 day, and only in temporary memory). Information collected is all public on ebay user profiles (with no login required to view the ebay feedback). Our app simply makes the publicly available information easy to read in a 1-page list format.

eBay Inc. is a multinational e-commerce corporation, facilitating online consumer-to-consumer and business-to-consumer sales. It is headquartered in San Jose, California. eBay was founded by Pierre Omidyar in 1995, and became a notable success story of the dot-com bubble. Today eBay is a multibillion-dollar business with operations in about 30 countries.

The company manages eBay.com, an online auction and shopping website in which people and businesses buy and sell a broad variety of goods and services worldwide. In addition to its auction-style sales, the website has since expanded to include "Buy It Now" shopping; shopping by UPC, ISBN, or other kind of SKU number (via Half.com); online classified advertisements (via Kijiji or eBay Classifieds); online event ticket trading (via StubHub); and other services. It previously offered online money transfers (via PayPal, which was a wholly owned subsidiary of eBay from 2002 until 2015). The website is free to use for buyers, but sellers are charged fees for listing items after a limited number of free listings, and again when those items are sold.

name: 1-click quality for Twitch
description:
1.1.1:
EN: Fixed spacing bug from v1.1, added animation toggle option.
PT: Corrigido um bug de espaçamento da v1.1, adicionado um botão para ativar e desativar a animação.

1.1:
EN: Added position, scale and language customization.
PT: Adicionado configurações de posição, tamanho e idioma.

EN:
Adds buttons below the stream so it lets you change qualities with just one click.

The On/Off switch saves the last quality setting, so that when you open new streams, that quality will be selected from the beginning. If it's off, it uses the last quality saved from then it was on or if you selected it through the native quality options.

If you want to go back and forth between many streams but want to let them running in low quality (160p) in the background, it's easier to change qualities this way. It was something I did for this exact purpose and thought someone else might think it's useful.

PT:
Adiciona botões abaixo do stream que permitem trocar de qualidade com um clique só.

O botão de liga e desliga salva a última qualidade e quando um novo stream é aberto, ele inicia com a qualidade salva. Se está desligado, a última qualidade salva ou a qualidade selecionada com os botões padrões do player será usada.

Caso queira ficar trocando de streams mas precisa que eles rodem em uma qualidade baixa quando não estiver assistindo (160p), é mais fácil trocar dessa forma. Foi algo que fiz exatamente com esse propósito e achei que mais alguém poderia achar útil.

name: 1-click remove
description:
Kindle Unlimitedに登録されている本だけ「1-Clickで今すぐ買う」を表示しないようにし、キンドル本のページからクラウドリーダーでひらく。

Kindle Unlimitedが始まって対象の本は定額で読み放題で間違って購入するのを防ぐ。Kindle Unlimitedに登録されている本だけ「1-Clickで今すぐ買う」を表示しないようにして、間違って購入しないようにするツール。

アイコンをクリックすると、「クラウドリーダー」と「KindleUNLIMITEDの管理ページヘ」のリンクができる。アマゾンのキンドルのページで「クラウドリーダーで読む」をクリックすると、現在みているキンドルをクラウドリーダーで開く。
[対象サイト]
Amazon（https://www.amazon.co.jp/）
キンドルクラウドリーダー（https://read.amazon.co.jp/）


GitHubのページ
https://github.com/kyukyunyorituryo/1click-remove

name: 1-Click Shorten URL
description:
"1-Click" and shorten any url. 1ClickURLs.com is the only shortener that can shorten more than 1 URL at a time ... shorten multiple URLs at one time.

Make a URL short and easy to copy and paste with our 1-Click copy button.

Easier than google goo.gl, tinyurl.com tinyurl, bit.ly bitly.com, owly ow.ly, isgd is.gd, buffly buff.ly, adfly adf.ly, bitdo bit.do, mcafee mcaf.ee.

Addon uses 3rd party site (www.1clickurls.com) for operation.

name: 1-Click URL Opener
description:
*Open all the URLs you want with the click of 1 button!*

Do you have a lot of websites you want to visit everyday? You can now do that with the click of 1 button!

Why choose 1-Click URL Opener?
- It's easy! (ezpz)
- It's fast! (2fast4u)
- It's handy! (handy-dandy)

Download this extension today!

name: 1-Click Youtube Repeat (with Play Counter)
description:
"1-Click" and no need to hit the play button again when listening to videos or songs.

Play Youtube videos and repeat and loop your favorite Youtube videos and songs. It's the easiest Looper around and comes with a free counter. Keep a counter of how many times you've played so you know how addicted to a good song you are.

Addon uses 3rd party site (www.tubepeat.com) for operation.

name: 1 Key Web Search
description:
1 Key Web Search makes web searching faster by associating your keyboard Keys with your Search Engines for instant access.
Although Firefox has improved web searching over the last few years, this Add-on will speed it up even more by eliminating the mouse from your web searches. Since you need to be typing to enter your search text anyway, it doesn't make ergonomic sense to have to do anything with the mouse in order to search.
This Add-on also can search the web for text displayed on any web page with one keypress.

name: 10 Minutes Disposable email
description:
Get your own temporary disposable 10 minute mail address without registration.
The extension provides free 10 minute mail service.
Disposable email with attachments and very easy to use.

How to use ?
Install the app to your browser and enjoy temporary 10 minute disposable email addresses without visiting the website itself. Just click the icon in the right upper corner of the browser. A window with new temporary email address will appear in a second. This window will also appear with notifications about new emails in your inbox.

Please visit our website for more questions : https://10minEmail.com

name: 1000 Bots - Surf the Web as Googlebot
description:
1000 Bots is a simple web extension which changes your browser’s user agent to that of the Googlebot. Googlebot is a web crawler which surfs the web extensively to build a searchable index for the Google search engine (making it one of the most influential Internet users. Only what it sees is indexed and can later be found by other users). By changing your settings to match those of Googlebot, you become one of thousands of Google web crawlers browsing the web to index its contents.

Surfing the web as Googlebot gives you access to what is referred to as the grey web, a layer of content only visible to bots. In some cases it might give you access to websites and archives that are usually hidden behind a paywall. Because while the website owner will present the regular user with a login page, they will give web crawlers access to their full archive in order for it to be represented in Google’s search results.

Step 1:
💻 Install the web extension

Step 2:
📡 To start surfing as Googlebot, clicking on the icon in the browser toolbar

Step 3:
🏄🏾‍♀️ Surf your favourite websites

Step 4:
🌐 Check RYBN's Double Negative Capchas to see if you pass the bot test.
https://1000scores.com/portfolio-items/rybn-double-negative-captchas/
(You might have to take the test twice until it works.)

1000 Bots is an art piece by !Mediengruppe Bitnik commissioned by the website 1000scores.com & Literaturforum im Brecht-Haus Berlin.

The source code [1] for 1000 Bots is free software and published under the GNU GPLv3. 1000 Bots is a response to RYBN's wonderful work Double Negative Captchas.

<3 !Mediengruppe Bitnik

[1] source code: https://wwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww.bitnik.org/data/code/1000_bots_webextension.zip

name: 101weiqiLocalizer
description:
101weiqi.com is a Chinese language web site where you can solve problems for the Go / Weiqi / Baduk board game. This add-on aims to make it easier for those of us who don't read Chinese to use that site, by adding a script to 101weiqi.com's pages which replaces a list of common words with the English translation. It does not alter the functionality of 101weiqi.com in any way.

This add-on was initially developed as a Chrome extension, and it's distributed here with permission from the author. The code can be found on GitHub. The original author is Marcel Grünauer and his code is here.

name: 10Buy
description:
הוסף מוצרים ישירות מ-eBay ו-AliExpress לחנות שלך ב-10Buy.
תתווסף תיבה בעמוד ה-eBay/AliExpress של המוצר להוספה מהירה - ממנה ניתן להוסיף את המוצר לחנות ה-10Buy באופן ישיר ולבחור קטגוריה עבורו.

name: 10words: startups in every tab
description:
Don't you love finding a perfect app you didn't even know you needed?

There's a whole world of apps and startups out there, but discovery can boring and time consuming. Your time is precious, and 10words is here to help.

Learn about a new app or startup in every new tab, in 10 words or less. No flashy graphics or marketing fluff, just a quick description and a link to learn more. Not interested? Carry on with your browsing and get another app in the next tab.

10words is the simplest way to discover your next favorite app, seamlessly fitting into your life.

====> Startups and apps are sourced from 10words.io
====> Would you like to include your project? Submit it free at 10words.io

name: 10ten Japanese Reader (Rikaichamp)
description:
Look up Japanese words with the hover of a mouse.

After enabling the add-on from the toolbar (or press Alt+R) simply hover over Japanese text and a popup displays corresponding dictionary definitions.

Features:

Pitch accent information
Automatically updating dictionaries (updating twice a week)
Support for non-English dictionaries
Translation of
Japanese yen amounts (e.g. 30億円) into another currency,
Japanese numbers (e.g. 13億5千万 into 1,350,000,000),
Japanese-era years (e.g. 昭和５６年、令和元年),
畳/帖 measurements (e.g. 四畳半、12.6 帖),
shogi moves (e.g. ☗８三銀引成)
Recognition of a wide range of grammatical forms (e.g. 兼した, 食べてた, 分からん、じーちゃん、頑張ろー、そーゆー, 買っとく etc.)
Automatic preview of name entries
Handling of a wide range of characters (e.g. ㌀, ㋿, 𠏹沢, ８月, Ｂ級グルメ,
オーサカ)
Localized into Japanese (so you can study Japanese while you study Japanese!) and Simplified Chinese
Romaji transliteration
Copy to clipboard in various formats
Support for the widest range of Web content (vertical text, SVG images, hidden text etc.)
Minimal memory usage
Kanji data for Kanji kentei, Conning references, updated educational levels, heavily reworked kanji components etc.

10ten Japanese Reader aims to be simple, reliable, fast, and always up-to-date.

Twitter: @10tenstudy

name: 123 Movies Hub Subtitle Changer
description: This Add-on can change/load subtitle/caption at https://gomovies.to/ . The demo can be viewed at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rj9yUnVgPSQ . This Add-on will automate the procedures that can be viewed here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XfO6UBJll2w . The Google Chrome counterpart can be downloaded here https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/123-movies-subtitle-chang/ggkmgmfojgkbdnhebbgkallikhdlcaik .

name: 12306加速狗
description:
12306官网提供自动刷票机制，所以完全没必要购买那些莫名的刷票软件，只是12306的官刷间隔要5秒之久，且预先设定的人员车次坐席等信息，很容易在中途丢失，导致不能自动提交。

这个小工具可以助力刷票加速，缩短刷票间隔，速度提升数倍，同时帮助记忆订票信息，无须重新设置，争分夺秒助你完成订单提交。

按照说明4步骤，多加熟练，可以大大提升买到票的几率。

小工具不涉及验证码破解和个人隐私数据，免费分享，希望所有人都有票回家。
